name: FAnimNode_SpringBone
doc: Simple controller that replaces or adds to the translation/rotation of a single bone.

SpringBone: Name of bone to control. This is the main bone chain to modify from. *
MaxDisplacement: If bLimitDisplacement is true, this indicates how long a bone can stretch beyond its length in the ref-pose.
ErrorResetThresh: If spring stretches more than this, reset it. Useful for catching teleports etc
LODThreshold:
* Max LOD that this node is allowed to run
* For example if you have LODThreshold to be 2, it will run until LOD 2 (based on 0 index)
* when the component LOD becomes 3, it will stop update/evaluate
* currently transition would be issue and that has to be re-visited
Alpha: Current strength of the skeletal control
bLimitDisplacement: Limit the amount that a bone can stretch from its ref-pose length.
bTranslateX: If true take the spring calculation for translation in X
bTranslateY: If true take the spring calculation for translation in Y
bTranslateZ: If true take the spring calculation for translation in Z
bRotateX: If true take the spring calculation for rotation in X
bRotateY: If true take the spring calculation for rotation in Y
bRotateZ: If true take the spring calculation for rotation in Z
